text: Armando Em√≠lio Guebuza (born 20 January 1943) is a Mozambican politician. He was President of Mozambique from 2005 to 2015. In August 2021, his son Ndambi Guebuza was tried for corruption. ==References== ==Other websites== *Office of the President Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Mozambique
title: Armando Guebuza
